reviewText: I like the subject matter and the treatment.  Can't say it's the most erotic, but it has it's moments.  Especially smoking through the wall.
Very old and very beautiful film miracle. Try to compare with empty films of today. B&W only but more interesting and intensive then computer generated comics.

One amazing silent film, that must be seen by any film student, film industry professional, artists of all venues.
I know why it is a silent film, it made me speechless.
